Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
      • Layer

  • public class Layer
extends Shape
    Represents a single brushstroke made by the artist. Has an ArrayList of points to store the coordinates of the curved line drawn.
    Version:
    5/16/18
    Author:
    Rebecca Refaee
